article_title: Health-sharing ministries offer Texans insurance alternative
article_text:
Health-sharing ministries offer Texans insurance alternative

Photo: Thomas B. Shea Colleen Morales, playing with daughters Catherine and Martha, says...

With open enrollment of the 2015 health insurance marketplace set to begin next month, so-called health-sharing ministries are reaching out to potential members who seek health care coverage but don't want or can't afford insurance.
